faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions — Try On Hairstyle
faq.description: Have questions about our AI hairstyle online free tool and haircut simulator? We've got answers.

items.title: How does the virtual hairstyle try-on work?
items.description: Our AI-powered haircut simulator maps hairstyles onto your uploaded photo for a realistic preview. It helps you try on hairstyle before cutting or coloring.

items.title: Can I really Try on hairstyle for free?
items.description: Yes! AI Hairstyle Changer is completely free to use. You can try on haircuts and experiment with different looks through our virtual hair style generator without any cost, including free men hairstyle online options.

items.title: How to use the AI Hairstyle Try-On API?
items.description: 1. Register as a developer. 2. Create an application and obtain an API key. 3. Follow the documentation to integrate a virtual haircut generator that lets users try on hairstyle with their picture for free.

items.title: Can I use my own photo?
items.description: Absolutely! Upload your photo to preview styles with our simulator. Our virtual hair style generator works best with clear, front-facing photos so you can try on hairstyle with better accuracy.

items.title: Is this suitable for both men and women?
items.description: Yes. You can preview men’s and women’s hairstyles and hair colors in a virtual hair style experience and try on hairstyle in seconds.

items.title: How do I preview hairstyles for men or women?
items.description: Open the editor, upload a clear front-facing photo, and start to try on hairstyle to preview styles. You can also browse looks in our virtual hair style gallery.

items.title: Does the tool support face shapes?
items.description: Yes. Suggestions adapt by face shape and length to help you try on hairstyle that matches your features.

items.title: Can I use it without signing up?
items.description: Yes. Guest mode works instantly, and you can try on hairstyle without creating an account.

items.title: Are the results realistic?
items.description: We aim for photorealism: edge-aware alignment and color blending help you try on hairstyle realistically.

items.title: How do I change hair color during the try-on?
items.description: Select a color chip and run it again to try on hairstyle with the new shade while keeping volume and shape consistent.

items.title: Can I download the preview?
items.description: Yes, use the Download button to save your try on hairstyle result for sharing or feedback.

items.title: What photo rules improve results?
items.description: Use a sharp, front-facing photo with even lighting to try on hairstyle cleanly and avoid artifacts.

items.title: Is it mobile-friendly?
items.description: Absolutely. Tap Upload on mobile and try on hairstyle on the go—the flow is optimized for small screens.

items.title: How does the API power hairstyle try-on?
items.description: Integrate our endpoints to add a try on hairstyle experience into your app. The generator powers a programmable virtual hair style flow.

items.title: What makes your try-on different?
items.description: Edge-aware rendering and color realism. Our stack pairs diffusion with a tuned generator to deliver consistent try on hairstyle previews.
